description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Descriptive and historical notices of some remarkable Northumbrian Castles, Churches and Antiquities, in a series of visits to the ruined Priory of Finchale, the Abbey Church of Hexham, etc. With biographical notices of eminent persons. Series 1" Author: GIBSON, William Sidney. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 797.k.6." Page: 10 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1848 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001417353 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
